confirm.unsaved: You have unsaved changes. Leave anyway?

thumbnail.tooLarge: File size must be 5MB or less

caption.creditWarningMessage: {credits} AI credits will be deducted for caption generation. Continue?
caption.placeholder: Enter caption content in SRT format...

image.title: Images
image.maxFileSize: File size must be 50MB or less
image.supportedFormats: Supported: JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, HEIC
image.storyHint: Create a story with multiple images

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.description: User management, CS support, role & status changes
admin.confirmDeactivateMsg: Deactivate {name}? They will be blocked from using the service.
pageGuide: Search users, change roles, and manage user status
Click a user to view details including videos, channels, and subscription info
Adjust individual storage quotas or reset to plan defaults

aiProvider.title: Default AI Provider
aiProvider.description: Choose the AI model for AI features (meta generation, hashtags, ideas, etc.).

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your profile, notifications, and default preferences
pageGuide: Set up your profile information and creator category
Adjust notification methods (email, push) and frequency
Configure default visibility, platforms, and AI tone for video uploads

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.emailHint: Social account email cannot be changed.
profile.imageSizeError: Image file must be 5MB or less.
profile.imageTypeError: Only JPG, PNG, and WebP image formats are allowed.
profile.nicknameMinLength: Nickname must be at least 2 characters.
profile.saveError: Failed to save profile. Please try again.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.emailAlertDesc: Receive email notifications on upload completion or failure
notifications.commentRealtimeDesc: Get notified immediately for every comment
notifications.commentHourlyDesc: Get a comment summary every hour
notifications.commentDailyDesc: Get a comment summary once a day
notifications.creditThresholdError: Credit alert threshold must be between 5-50%.
notifications.reminder1hDesc: Get notified 1 hour before scheduled upload
notifications.reminder30mDesc: Get notified 30 minutes before scheduled upload
notifications.saveError: Failed to save notification settings. Please try again.

defaults.title: Default Settings
defaults.visibilityDesc: Default visibility setting applied when uploading videos.
defaults.platformsDesc: Platforms selected by default when uploading videos.
defaults.aiToneDesc: Default tone used by AI when generating titles and descriptions.
defaults.languageDesc: Select the language for the app
defaults.saveError: Failed to save default settings. Please try again.

account.title: Account Information
account.dangerDesc: Deleting your account will permanently remove all data and cannot be undone.
account.deleteConfirm: All data will be permanently deleted. Are you sure you want to delete your account?
account.deleteError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

brandDeal.title: Brand Deal Management
brandDeal.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this deal?
pageGuide: Track and manage brand deal statuses from inquiry to completion
Create a media kit to share with brands
Record deal amounts and deadlines to manage revenue

audience.title: Audience CRM

segment.empty: No segments found. Add a new segment to get started.
segment.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this segment?

audience.description: Analyze your audience by managing fan profiles and segments
pageGuide: Manage fan data from all platforms and check engagement scores in the Fan Profiles tab
Sort by engagement, interactions, or recent activity to identify your core fans
Group fans by conditions in the Segments tab for targeted marketing
Auto-update segments automatically add fans that match the defined conditions

preview.creator: Creator
preview.platformInfo: Preview how your content will look on each platform. Displayed in optimized format for each platform.
preview.selectPlatform: Select a platform to see preview

brandDealRevenue.title: Brand Deal Revenue
brandDealRevenue.noData: No brand deal revenue data available

aiReport.title: AI Revenue Analysis Report
aiReport.noReport: Generate an AI revenue report to get started

strategyCoach.title: AI Strategy Coach
strategyCoach.description: Analyzes cross-platform data and trends to recommend optimal content strategies
strategyCoach.noData: Start the AI Strategy Coach to get recommendations

faq.title: FAQ Auto-Classification
faq.noData: Start FAQ analysis to get clusters

batchReply.title: Batch AI Replies
batchReply.generate: Generate AI replies for selected comments
batchReply.noData: No batch AI reply data available

dashboard.noScheduleDescription: Set up scheduled publishing when uploading videos to see them here.
pageGuideMobile: Tap KPI cards to navigate to detail pages (Analytics, Channels, Subscription)
Use quick action buttons for Upload, AI Tools, and Schedule
Scroll horizontally through recent uploads and tap to view details
Track channel growth with the 7/30-day views trend chart
Check today's and tomorrow's scheduled posts in the schedule section
pageGuideDesktop: Click KPI cards (Views, Subscribers, Likes, Credits) to navigate to detail pages
Use the Customize button to reorder and hide dashboard widgets
Compare performance across YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and Naver Clip in the trend chart
Discover content recycling opportunities from past popular videos
Monitor upcoming publishing schedules in the schedule widget

scheduleView.title: Schedule Management
scheduleView.noSchedulesDescription: Set up scheduled publishing when uploading videos to manage them here.

cancelModal.title: Cancel Schedule
cancelModal.message: Are you sure you want to cancel this schedule? Cancelled schedules cannot be restored.

pageGuide: Switch between List, Calendar, and Week views to see scheduled content your way
Use the Filter button to filter by platform, date range, or status (Pending/Completed/Failed)
Sort options (Date/Platform/Status/Manual) let you reorder the list; use drag in manual mode
Click a schedule item to view details and modify time or cancel
scheduleView.description: Manage your upload schedule with a calendar and auto-publish at optimal times

aiView.title: AI Creator Assistant
pageGuide: Use AI tools (title generation, hashtag extraction, description writing, etc.) in the AI Tools tab
Save and reuse frequently used AI settings (tone, target platform, category) in the Presets tab
View AI credit consumption history and generated results in the History tab
If the daily credit indicator turns red, recharge on the Subscription page
Hover over tooltip icons on tool cards to see credit costs and descriptions
aiView.description: Manage content creation and channel operations efficiently with AI tools

analyticsView.title: Unified Analytics
analyticsView.noCrossData: No videos uploaded to multiple platforms
analyticsView.noCrossDataHint: Upload the same video to 2+ platforms to start comparison analysis

cohort.title: Cohort Analysis
cohort.description: Group videos by category, tags, platform, or upload month and compare cumulative view trends.

retention.title: Audience Retention Curve
retention.description: Analyze viewer retention for videos. Compare with channel average to identify drop-off points.

analyticsView.emptyDataDescription: Analytics data including views, likes, and comments will appear within 24 hours after publishing videos.
analyticsView.uploadTimeHint: Average views by day/hour - darker colors indicate higher views
analyticsView.aiAnalyzing: AI is generating an analysis report...
pageGuide: Set analysis period with 7/30/90-day filters and export data as CSV/Excel
View KPI cards (Views, Subscribers, Likes, Revenue) and platform comparison charts in Overview
Find optimal posting times using the day/hour heatmap
Click tags in the Tag Cloud to see detailed performance (usage count, avg views)
Generate AI insight reports (8 credits) for key improvement points
Analyze cumulative view trends by category and viewer drop-off points in Cohort/Retention tabs
analyticsView.description: Monitor your channel performance and build data-driven growth strategies

commentsView.title: Comment Management
commentsView.emptyCommentsHint: Click "Sync Comments" to fetch platform comments
pageGuide: Click the sync button to fetch the latest comments from all connected platforms (shows last sync time)
Use the sentiment analysis bar at the top to quickly see the ratio of positive (green), neutral (gray), and negative (red) comments
Track daily sentiment changes with the trend chart, and use FAQ auto-classification to identify frequently asked questions
Select comments and click the AI reply button to generate draft replies for multiple comments at once

linkBioView.title: Link in Bio
pageGuide: Add, edit, delete, and reorder links via drag-and-drop in the Editor tab
Copy your profile URL and paste it in your platform profile for fans to access
Preview how visitors will see your page in the Preview tab
Monitor link page performance (Total Views, Total Clicks, Click Rate) in the stats bar
Click Save to instantly publish changes to your live page

upload.title: Content Upload

dropzone.dragDrop: Drag & drop to upload video or photo
dropzone.formatHint: Video: MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, WebM (max 2GB) • Photo: JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, HEIC (max 50MB)

error.platformRequired: Please select platforms to publish to.

upload.description: Upload video files, auto-generate metadata with AI, and publish to multiple platforms
pageGuide: Step 1: Drag or click to select video files. Selecting multiple files will add them to the upload queue
Step 2: Enter title, description, and tags manually, or use the AI auto-generate button (15 credits with STT, 5 credits basic)
Enable AI Pipeline mode to auto-process metadata generation, hashtag extraction, and optimization in one step
Step 3: Select target platforms and configure different titles, descriptions, and scheduled times per platform
Use the upload queue button to manage pending files - publish immediately or add to queue for batch publishing

channels.title: Channel Management
channels.description: Connect and manage your YouTube, TikTok, Instagram channels
pageGuide: Use the Connect Channel button to link your YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and Naver Clip accounts via OAuth
View total channels, healthy, warning, and error status counts in the summary cards above
If a channel token shows warning (yellow) or error (red), use the reconnect button to refresh the token
Use the Sync All button to update subscriber and content info for all channels
Disconnecting a channel will stop uploads and analytics for that platform
channels.emptyDescription: Connect your YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, or Naver Clip channels to start uploading and analyzing videos.
channels.disconnectMessage:
Are you sure you want to disconnect {platform} channel "{name}"?

Uploads and analytics for this platform will be stopped.
channels.disconnectError: Failed to disconnect. Please try again.

videos.title: Video Management
videos.description: Manage your uploaded videos and check platform performance
pageGuide: Search by title or tags and filter by platform (YT/TT/IG/NV), status (Published/Scheduled/Draft), and date to quickly find videos
Switch between grid and list views, and sort by views, likes, or newest
Enable selection mode to check multiple videos for bulk delete, publish, category change, or AI batch processing
Use the favorites filter to view important videos, and right-click video cards to edit, recycle, re-upload, or delete
Use the export button to download your video list as CSV/Excel
videos.emptyDescription: Upload your first video and publish to YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and Naver Clip all at once.
videos.emptyFilterDescription: Try changing or clearing your filters.
videos.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected video(s)? This action cannot be undone.
videos.batchConfirmMessage:
Running '{operation}' on {count} selected video(s).
Estimated credits: {cost}
videos.categoryChangeError: Some videos failed to change category.
videos.batchStartError: Failed to start AI batch processing

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.description: View scheduled content on the calendar
pageGuide: Switch between monthly and weekly views to visualize your entire content schedule
Use the previous/next buttons and Today button to quickly navigate to any period
Drag and drop content items on the calendar to intuitively change publish schedules
Click on content for any date to view details and make edits

templates.title: Content Templates
templates.description: Save frequently used metadata templates and apply them quickly
pageGuide: Use the New Template button to save combinations of title, description, tags, and thumbnail metadata as templates
Filter by category tabs (Title/Description/Tags/Thumbnail/Full Package) to find specific template types
Search and sort (Newest/Most Used/Name) to quickly find templates
Apply saved templates during video upload to significantly reduce metadata entry time
Add frequently used templates to favorites for priority display at the top
templates.emptyDescription: Change search criteria or create a new template

brandKit.title: Brand Kit
brandKit.description: Apply consistent brand identity across all your content
pageGuide: Add, edit, and delete brand colors in the Color Palette section to maintain a consistent color system
Define brand fonts and text styles in the Typography section
Upload and manage logos, icons, images, and other brand visual assets in the Assets section
Write brand usage rules and style guides in the Guidelines section
Click section headers to collapse/expand, and use the Save button to apply changes
brandKit.colorPaletteDesc: Define and manage your brand colors
brandKit.brandAssetsDesc: Manage logos, watermarks, templates, and more
brandKit.guidelinesDesc: Document brand usage rules and guidelines

recycling.title: Content Recycling
recycling.description: Automatically repost popular content to maximize reach
pageGuide: Create auto-repost rules in the Queues tab and check active queue count and total recycled count
Set frequency (daily/weekly/monthly), target platforms, and title variation options for recycling rules
Review past recycling execution history and performance in the History tab
Check AI-analyzed repost recommendations in the Suggestions tab and add them directly to recycling queues
Preview upcoming content to be reposted in the Next Scheduled display
recycling.emptyQueuesDescription: Create your first recycling queue to automatically repost content
recycling.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this queue?
recycling.emptySuggestionsDescription: AI will analyze your existing videos to generate recycling suggestions

trend.title: Trend Monitoring
trend.description: Analyze real-time trends and discover content opportunities
pageGuide: Search for trends by keyword and filter by source (Google Trends/YouTube/Internal)
Click AI Trend Analysis to automatically analyze current trends and get content recommendations (5 credits)
View analysis summary and content recommendations in the AI Analysis tab
Set up trend change alerts for keywords of interest in the Alert Management tab
trend.analysisEmpty: Run AI analysis to see results here.

goals.title: Goals & Milestones
goals.description: Set channel growth goals and achieve them step by step
pageGuide: Use the New Goal button to set channel growth goals such as subscribers, views, and upload count
View active goals, completed goals, overall progress, and next deadline at a glance in the summary cards
Filter goals with active/completed toggle and sort by deadline, progress, or newest
Check achievement rates on each goal card's progress bar — milestones are automatically recorded when reached
Check the D-day for the nearest goal in the Next Deadline card
goals.emptyActiveDesc: Create a new goal to track your channel growth.
goals.emptyCompletedDesc: You haven't completed any goals yet.
goals.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this goal?

abTest.title: A/B Testing
abTest.description: Test thumbnails, titles, and descriptions to find the best performance
pageGuide: Use the New Test button to create A/B tests for thumbnails or titles and set up variants
Manage tests with status filters (All/Running/Completed/Draft) and grid/list views
View total tests, running, and completed counts in the top statistics
Check sample size, confidence, and duration on each test card and manage tests with start/stop/view results buttons
Review statistical significance indicators on completed tests to choose the better performing combination
abTest.emptyDesc: Create a new A/B test to optimize video performance
abTest.winnerApplied: The winning variant has been applied to the video!

competitor.title: Competitor Analysis
competitor.description: Benchmark competing channels and gain strategic insights
pageGuide: Use the Add Channel button to register benchmark channels and start monitoring with the tracking toggle
View subscribers, views, and content count of tracked competing channels in the List tab
Select multiple competing channels in the Comparison tab to compare key metrics side by side
Identify competitor trending videos and market trends in the Trending tab to inform your content strategy
Use the Refresh button to update competitor data to the latest
competitor.aiInsightEmpty: Click the AI Analysis button to get comparison insights with competitors
competitor.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this competitor channel?

automation.title: Automation Rules
automation.description: Automate repetitive tasks for efficient management
pageGuide: Create automations by combining triggers (conditions) and actions in the Rules tab using the New Rule button
Control rules with enable/disable toggles on each rule card and check execution count and last run time
Design complex automation flows (trigger → condition → action) with the visual node editor in the Workflows tab
Quickly get started by selecting frequently used automation patterns from Smart Templates
Check automation execution history in the Logs tab and identify causes of failed items
automation.emptyRulesDesc: Create your first automation rule to streamline your workflow
automation.confirmDeleteRule: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?
automation.confirmDeleteWorkflow: Are you sure you want to delete this workflow?
automation.workflowSubtitle: Advanced automation workflows with conditional branching and multiple actions
automation.emptyWorkflowsDesc: Create advanced automations with conditional branching and multiple actions

revenue.title: Revenue Analysis
revenue.description: Analyze revenue by platform and identify growth opportunities
pageGuide: Switch between weekly/monthly/yearly period filters to analyze revenue for your desired time range
Check total revenue (KRW), monthly growth rate (green=increase/red=decrease), and average RPM in the summary cards
Compare revenue per 1,000 impressions/views by platform in the CPM/RPM tab
View brand collaboration revenue in the Brand Deals tab
revenue.cpmRpmDesc: CPM = Revenue per 1,000 impressions · RPM = Revenue per 1,000 views
revenue.aiReportDesc: AI analyzes your revenue data to generate customized reports

inbox.title: Social Inbox
inbox.description: Manage messages from all platforms in one place
pageGuide: View all DMs and messages from every platform in the unified message list on the left
Use platform dropdown, message type, status filters, and search to quickly find messages
Click a message to view the full conversation and reply directly in the detail panel on the right
Unread messages appear in bold; organize with stars, archive, and delete
Check the top counters for total, unread, starred, and archived message counts
inbox.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

notifications.title: Notification Center
pageGuide: Filter notifications by category: uploads, publishing, comments, subscriptions, system, etc.
Unread notifications are highlighted and automatically marked as read when clicked
Click a notification to navigate directly to the related video, channel, or settings page
Open notification settings to enable or disable email and push notifications by category
Use Mark All Read to clear all unread notifications at once
notifications.emptyCategory: No notifications in the selected category.
notifications.emptyDescription: New notifications will appear here when they arrive.

ideas.title: Content Ideas
ideas.description: Manage content ideas and track production progress
pageGuide: Use the New Idea button to create content ideas and set priorities
Drag and drop between the 4 Kanban columns (Idea → Planning → Producing → Completed) to change status
Use search and priority filters to quickly find important ideas
Click an idea card to edit details and link completed ideas directly to video production

team.description: Manage team members and track collaboration activities
pageGuide: View team members in the Members tab and identify permission levels with role badges (Owner/Admin/Editor/Viewer)
Invite new members by email in the Invites tab and manage pending/expired invitations (resend/cancel)
Monitor recent team activity in the Activity tab
Configure granular role-based permissions in the Permissions tab to manage team security
View Owner, Admin, Editor, and Viewer counts at a glance in the role stats section
team.noInvitesDescription: Invite team members to start collaborating.
team.confirmCancelInvite: Are you sure you want to cancel this invitation?

webhooks.title: Webhook Management
webhooks.description: Deliver real-time events to external services
pageGuide: Register endpoint URLs to connect external services using the New Webhook button
Select events to receive (upload, publish, schedule, comments, etc.) and configure retry policies
Check total webhook count, active count, and failure count in the summary cards
Toggle webhooks on/off and use the test button to verify connectivity
Review request/response details (status codes, duration) in delivery logs to debug issues
webhooks.emptyDescription: Add a webhook to deliver upload, publish, and schedule events to external services in real time.
webhooks.integrationDescription: Webhook payloads are delivered in JSON format. Verify signatures using the X-Webhook-Signature header. For details, see the
webhooks.confirmDelete:
Are you sure you want to delete the webhook "{url}"?

Events will no longer be delivered after deletion.

notify.testError: An error occurred during test delivery.

activityLog.title: Activity Log
pageGuide: View all account activities (uploads, logins, settings changes, etc.) in chronological order
Use filters to view specific activity types
Download activity records via CSV export

subscription.title: Subscription & Billing
subscription.description: Manage your plan and view payment history
pageGuide: View your current plan and usage, and change plans
Check remaining AI credits and purchase additional credits
Review payment history and credit usage records
subscription.lowCreditWarning: Credits are running low. Consider purchasing more.

videoCompare.title: Video Comparison
videoCompare.description: Compare performance metrics between two videos
pageGuide: Select two videos to compare key metrics
Compare views, likes, comments, shares, and other core metrics at a glance
View detailed analysis charts for performance trends over time
videoCompare.emptyDescription: Select two videos above to see the comparison analysis.
